title: Incorrect SKCodecOrigin from dng files

comments.author: LukePulverenti
comments.body:
Looks like this is not limited to just dng. Here's a sample cr2 that is also affected. It is reported as TopLeft but it should be LeftBottom.
[IMG_1361.zip](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/files/1645431/IMG_1361.zip)

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
I can confirm this is happening... not sure why - maybe skia doesn't respect that property. I will have to investigate further.

A basic check reveals that the DNG codec ignores this. The only ones that appear to respect this are jpeg and webp.
